description:
RSVP for Classes at - http://www.SiliconDojo.com

Support Classes at - https://donorbox.org/etcg
Find All Classes at - https://www.elithecomputerguy.com
LinkedIn at - https://www.linkedin.com/in/eli-etherton-a15362211/

Code and Notes - https://github.com/SiliconDojo/Online-Classes/tree/main/Hacking%20Introduction

In this class we dive into the deepest recesses of the minds of Zimbabwean Ninja Hackers... What makes them tick... Why do they do it... and... how can we make something terribly boring look really cool in the movies???

"Hacking" is a skill set the same way as writing CSS is. You are simply using technology to solve a particular set of problems. It's not particularly cool, or sexy regardless of what Hollywood makes it seem.

In this session we will go over the core concepts of "hacking". We will also discuss legitimate reasons to hack, and legal implications for going down this route.

We'll Discuss:

What is hacking

What are White/ Grey/ Black Hat Hackers

Some tools of
title: Hacking - Introduction
